dt: {bc}to inhale vapor through the mouth from a usually battery-operated electronic device (such as an {d_link|electronic cigarette|electronic cigarette}) that heats up and vaporizes a liquid or solid

dt.t: This electronic cigarette … contains a small reservoir of liquid nicotine solution that is vaporized to form an aerosol mist. The user "{wi}vapes{/wi}," or puffs on the vapor, to get a hit of the addictive nicotine …
When a person tokes, eats or {wi}vapes{/wi} cannabis, a wave of THC, or tetrahydrocannabinol, washes into the brain.

utxt.t: The problem is that little is known about the precise dangers of being in the same space as a {wi}vaper{/wi} indulging their e-habit.

et: short for {et_link|vapor:1|vapor:1}, in reference to the aerosol produced by the cigarette, by analogy with {et_link|smoke:2|smoke:2}
shortdef: to inhale vapor through the mouth from a usually battery-operated electronic device (such as an electronic cigarette) that heats up and vaporizes a liquid or solid
